1.content:
You and Your friend Sam go to an old house or yours and since nobody owned it, you were free to explore.

When you walk in you see something sitting on the lounge

"Weird someone must've left it here by mistake." you spoke, clearly anxious.

"Then explain why It's FUCKING BREATHING." Sam shouted clearly scared shitless.

You see a gas pipe then a bulb thinking this thing was inhumane, you instantly think of burning the house.

"Hey, Sam, grab its attention, I need to do something but with him looking, I can't." you stated

"Ugh, alright." said Sam in disagreement

She stomps the floor, then the thing jumped on her in a millisecond!

"OH CRAP, IT'S GONNA KILL HER."

But the loud noise of your very convenient gunshot would stop it, or not?

Shoot the bulb, pipe or the thing?
1.title: The Thing

11.content:
You aim the gun but with your hands shaking, it was difficult but you managed to shoot the bulb perfectly!

The thing dropped Sam, who of which was obviously was petrified of fear, and immediately picked me up and
threw me across the room!

"Ah Fuck that hurt." you whisper as the thing turns back to Sam with a determined look.

"Here's my chance!" you say as you look at the creature, then back to the pipe.

Sam looks at you with the 'WTF MAN?' when she realises the thing is approaching, slowly though, you snap back and realise you have a small time to react.

Burn him or shoot him?
11.title: Shoot the Bulb

111.content:
His back is turned, here is your opportunity.

You aim, then pull the trigger.

Boom!

You missed! He must've jumped out of the way!

But where did he go?

You feel breathing on your neck, you turn around but for only a second, the thing gave Sam my head for a present.

Sams Perspective

"OH CRAP!" I shouted

I Grab James' gun and I crawl towards the exit.

But somehow he is just looking at James' corpse, it's back is to me.

Should I shoot him?
111.title: Shoot him

1111.content:
You take this opportunity to shoot him in the back of the head, he falls so you run to the exit

You hear loud footsteps behind you signalling to go faster

You barely make it, you flip the switch and the corpse of that thing flies over your head.

You Did it




SAM SURVIVED
1111.title: Shoot Him

1112.content:
You keep still, but you did something, something you regret,

You dropped the gun and it heard the gun.

It gave a banshee-like scream. Then he jumped on me but where did my body go?




YOU DIED
1112.title: Stay Still

112.content:
You aim directly at the pipe, again you didn't miss.

The thing jumps on you, picks you up, and then throws you again

You realise he didn't kill you cause you didn't move, then you move your hand to your ribcage and he leaps at you

Sam watching fearfully, you think he will miss and if you move your gun to shoot, he will most likely see and directly hit you.

But you've never missed here so your feeling confident but still is it worth it?

Shoot him or Stay Still?
112.title: Shoot the Pipe

1121.content:
You pull the trigger straight away and again you don't miss.

You signal Sam to get out while you made sure the thing was distracted

While this was working, you limped your way outside, flipping the switch and hopefully finishing off the- whatever that was.

Sam got out and the police came and picked you two up, you both are home safe.




YOU BOTH SURVIVED
1121.title: Shoot Him

1122.content:
You stay still but he is gonna hit you!

You close your eyes for a second and when you open them, Sam and the thing
are fighting praying to save Sam, her head falls in front of your face as you hold in your crying

You could make a run for the light switch, combusting the whole house or shoot him and kill him that way.

He looks at you directly in the eye as you realise he can see you

Make a break for the light or Shoot him?
1122.title: Stay Still

11221.content:
You grab Sams' corpse to give her the proper burying that she deserves, she killed herself to keep you alive

You make it to the door and you flip the switch, the thing not leaving

"I got him, I DID IT, this was for you, Sam." You get to release the sadness from Sams' death

The police get there, Sam is buried and you return home safely.

Was the thing human?

Was he from Earth?

Will we ever know?
11221.title: Run for the light

11222.content:
He is so gonna kill you before you even get up.

You aim, BOOM! you shoot him but not a second later he jumps at you

"AHHHHHHHHHHHH-" your screaming stops as you're decapitated is a second.

At least you went with Sam.




YOU DIED
11222.title: Shoot him

12.content:
You hesitate in shock, you aim but he disappeared as you pulled the trigger.

You creep up to where they disappeared too to see Sam's head & Body.

"NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO." you scream.

You see the figure of the thing and you immediately think of shooting him but you think of the pipe and if you aim for the bulb, he would see you!

The pipe is simple as its like right next to you but shooting it would help definitely.

But what?

Pipe or The Thing?
12.title: Shoot the thing

121.content:
You quickly aim at him and pull the trigger BUT YOU MISSED.

But he is gone???

'Where the Fuck is that creepy-ass son of a Bitch."

"That cunt will pay."

But in Fact, you will be paying as you are forced to turn around and the thing borrowed your head from your body.


YOU DIED

(but you gave a random entity a present)
121.title: Shoot him

122.content:
You aim at the pipe, and gas is now in the room.

"Yes, you are gonna burn in hell you son of a bitch."

But you are not ready yet, you need to expose the inside of a bulb first.

Or just quickly shoot him to death.

"Ugh, quick and easy or slow and hot?"

So Shoot Him or Shoot the bulb
122.title: Shoot the pipe

1221.content:
You pull the trigger you miss.

"FUCK ME!"

Your last words spill out as the thing jumps at you and starts to feed on your intestines

"CANIB-"

Was it even human?


YOU DIED
1221.title: Shoot him

1222.content:
You pull the trigger, a glass shard spikes your shin

"AH. ON A SCALE OF 1-10 THIS IS OVER 9000 (see what I did there?)

It jumps at you and throws you, happily closer to the door, but he is too close.

"If I shoot it, then it will be further away so I can finish it!"

"But if I wait it out, he will probably move away."

Shoot him or Wait it out?
1222.title: Shoot the Bulb

12221.content:
You aim the gun, and the trigger is pulled.

You couldn't see for a bit but when the smoke disappears, he is just lying on the floor.

"Here's my chance!" you say to yourself.

You think of just shooting it right in its sorry face, but burning it is well a good option.

It's twitching, so you don't have much time.

What will it be?

Shoot It or Burn It?
12221.title: Shoot It

122211.content:
You aim the gun but you drop it!

The impact makes a loud BANG! As it was set off, right into your kneecap.

"SHIT!" You scream as the creature jumps onto your face and shoves your throat straight into your stomach.

Well, at least it was tasty.





YOU DIED
122211.title: Shoot It

122212.content:
You run, not stopping for your cursed shin, it follows you

It is breathing on your neck, you turn around and shoot it quicker than a cheetah.

It stopped moving, not even an inch.

"Burn, Bitch!" You shout as you flip the switch.

You see Sam's corpse smash out the window.

Later the police arrive.

You are now home safe


JAMES SURVIVED
122212.title: Burn It

12222.content:
I'll just wait, it should go away.

You were wrong, it had already seen you it grabbed you and took you head as a souvenir.

Your intestines apparently make great food.



YOU DIED
12222.title: Wait it out

13.content:
The pipe is right next to you so you just stomp on it, but it was still enough to grab the things attention.

It jumps at you in a millisecond

"OH MY GOD!" You scream as you're thrown across the room.

It turns back to Sam, giving you the opportunity to shoot it, or the bulb.

You have a clear shot for both while the thing is closer.

It looks like it's gonna kill Sam and soon.

What will it be, The Thing or The Bulb?
13.title: Shoot the gas pipe

131.content:
"I can't risk Sam for this." You say to yourself as the thing flies across the room with a pull of the trigger.

"Thanks," stated Sam "I was sure you were gonna ditch me."

"I wouldn't do that." as you say this you get pushed over by it.

"No, no, no, I'm not dying today." Famous last words. It ripped your skin off one piece at a time, even worse, Sam had to watch.

Sam's Perspective

It teared him up like a piece of paper, I grabbed his gun and remembered his plan, or should I shoot him?

Shoot The Thing or the Bulb?
131.title: The Thing

132.content:
You aim the gun and you do it quickly, pulling the trigger, the thing jumps in your face and throws you across the room, near the exit.

"RUN, GET OUT!" You shout at Sam, trying to save her.

She runs out as the thing follows her.

"HEY!" you scream at it, it immediately turns around and jumps near you

"Did he see me?" you think as he draws closer.

"Should I shoot him to make sure?"

Shoot it or stay still?
132.title: Shoot the Bulb

1322.content:
You freeze, not sure if it was you or your fear.

But it turned and looked you straight in the eyes.

"NO, move you, son of a Bitch!" Sam shouted as she runs back inside and tackles it.

But by the time you got up, she was gone.

All that remained, was her head.

"NO!" you shouted, but unfortunately, it heard you.

You still had the gun, but you had the chance to burn him.

Burn It or Shoot it?
1322.title: Stay Still

13221.content:
As you are already standing up, you just turn around.

Sprinting, you hear the thing behind you, but you are almost there.

You don't stop and you flip the switch.

The banshee-like scream filled your ears, but it was dead al least.



JAMES SURVIVED
13221.title: Burn It

13222.content:
You aren't going to make it to the switch.

You aim and you pull the trigger.

He flies across the room and darts straight back at you.

He snatches your head and puts it next to Sam's.

"Who is this demented freak?" you say before it all goes black.

YOU DIED
13222.title: Shoot It

info.brief_description: You and a friend encounter an insane thing, will you and your friend make it out alive?
info.description:
Hey, if you are looking to add to this, it's a short one and I finished it myself. Thanks anyway!

This is about you (James Gother) and your friend (Samantha Davies) finding an insane man who intends on them staying, alive or not.

If at any time James dies, you will have the perspective of Sam, however, if both die you have to restart (or go back a step which, try to avoid if possible)

This is part 1 of three in this nightmare so if you want them to return (they will be alive in the next story).

Remember, your choices affect you and Sam, choose wisely.
